name: FraudGuard Plugin
author: FraudGuard.io

sections.description:
FraudGuard is a service designed to provide an easy way to validate usage by continuously collecting and analyzing
real-time internet traffic. Utilizing a single API endpoint we make integration as simple as possible and return data
like Risk Level, Threat Type, Geo Location, etc. Super fast, super simple.

This plugin will block any traffic originating from a source IP with a risk level of 5 based on the FraudGuard system.
Any IP with a risk level of 5 is guaranteed to be malicious traffic based on how it’s found and categorized by FraudGuard.

To use this plugin you must have an active FraudGuard account. You can create an account at https://fraudguard.io. There
is a free account available for small sites and testing.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/fraudguard directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen and follow the instructions to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial version of plugin.

1.1

  • Updated Tested Version.
  • Minor wording change to clear things up.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/fraudguard directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen and follow the instructions to configure the plugin

short_description: Plugin to quickly and easily add support for FraudGuard into any WordPress site.
